StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOtherTelephonesByPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int ) AS
SELECT -1 AS [ID] ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[AREA_CODE] ,[TELEPHONE_NUMBER] ,[TELEPHONE_TYPE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] != 'C' AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] != 'H'
